content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory found

### Lab at position(x= unknown)
Consists of a lab with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 67}

### Chests
Consists of following entities
-  Chest (position x=43.5, y=-82.5) 
-  Chest (position x=40.5, y=-80.5) 
-  Chest (position x=43.5, y=-81.5) 
-  Chest (position x=2.5, y=0.5) 
-  Chest (position x=0.5, y=2.5) 
-  Chest (position x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a full chest
-  Make sure the chest is not full before extracting items
-  Empty the chest before extracting items
### Errors when using extract_item API
-  Make sure the quantity to extract is not more than the available items in the chest
-  Make sure the chest is not full before extracting items
### Errors when a burner mining drill has no space to drop items
-  Make sure the chest at the drop position is not full
-  Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining
### Errors when a furnace has no ingredients to smelt
-  Make sure the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt
-  Provide the required ingredients to the furnace
### Errors when a boiler is out of fuel
-  Make sure the boiler has fuel
-  Provide fuel to the boiler
### Errors when a steam engine has no input liquid
-  Make sure the steam engine has an input liquid
-  Provide an input liquid to the steam engine
### Errors when a pipe has no fluid present in connections
-  Make sure the pipe has a fluid present in connections
-  Provide a fluid to the pipe connections
